column3: Description
Texts Look OK in GUI, About, error dialogs
The user manual works
Many widgets are disabled when streaming
Max channels for vorbis, raw and mp3 look ok
JACK is detected as running or not
JACK2 is detected as running or not
Peer negotiate max numchannels correcylt (if one has lucid GST)
A/V sync works (use scenic -d)
A/V async works (use scenic -d)
A third peer cannot invite a peer that is streaming
A third peer cannot invite a peer that is negotitating
all detected size work for v4l2 devices
all detected sizes work for videotestsrc
changing norm works (v4l2-ctl --all)
changing input works (v4l2-ctl --all)
transmitting MIDI works (test with zynaddsubfx)
VU meters works in A/V sync mode
VU meters works in A/V async mode
Fullscreen mode works
Using :0.1 X11 display works
help is included in packaging
docbook in HTML is included
doxygen generated doc is included in the package
Dependencies are met for the debian package on Lucid
